products.title: Legacy Athena Cream 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: The legacy blind is a beautiful, elegant and modern textured fabric which is available in a range of soft colours. This cream vertical blind is the perfect addition to any room as the neutral tone will go with existing decor whilst the pattern will add a stylish feel. Product id: sdb-vtb0963 fabric colour: athena cream material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes legacy athena cream 89mm vertical blind in cream.

products.title: Legacy Athena Vertical Blind
products.description: Using matt and sheen threads to create a soft leaf-like shaped pattern. Available in other colours. Legacy athena vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mmmin drop: 500mm max drop: 3500mmfabric composition: polyesterlouvre width: 89mmguarantee: 12 monthsfittings: includedcontrols: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
